mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.USER_SEQ, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.REG_DT, b.READ_COUNT FROM BOARD b, USERS u WHERE b.USER_SEQ = u.USER_SEQ ORDER BY b.BOARD_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( USER_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DT, READ_COUNT ) VALUES ( #{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0 )
INSERT INTO BOARD_FILE ( BOARD_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_URL ) VALUES ( #{boardId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileUrl} )
